snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and Mayor Bill de Blasio, who have been throwing verbal barbs at each other for weeks, both spoke at the Bronx Democratic County Committee on Thursday night.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo and New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio both speak at Bronx Democratic County Committee, but their feud continues as Cuomo leaves event before de Blasio arrives; neither mentions the other in their remarks.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and Mayor Bill de Blasio, who have been throwing verbal barbs at each other for weeks, both spoke at the Bronx Democratic County Committee on Thursday night.

headline.main: Cuomo and de Blasio Still Keep a Distance
headline.print_headline: Governor and Mayor Still Keep a Distance
